description:
Keep your kit clean, or at least cleaner. If you’re the type of rider that isn’t going to let a little, or a lot, of precipitation keep you off the bike, then these adjustable fenders will make your wet rides more enjoyable.

  • Adjustable design lets you match the fit to your bike
  • Extended tail adds a little extra length but a lot of extra protection
  • 41mm width helps catch extra spray
  • Works with most disc brake and thru-axle bikes
  • Made from post-consumer recycled materials
name: MEC Road Bike Fenders
